about.title: About Me
about.description_1: Software Development student at UADE with experience in web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Knowledge of relational databases (MySQL, SQL Server) and NoSQL (MongoDB).
about.description_2: Familiar with programming paradigms in Python and Java. Version control using Git and GitHub. Interested in both frontend and backend roles, with fast learning ability, focus on best practices, and effective collaboration in development teams.
